title: Replace UPI QR code with uploaded user image in PaywallModal

requirements.summary: Replace the existing QR code in PaywallModal with the uploaded UPI QR code image showing NIDHI AESTICARE and UPI ID nidhi.aesticare@okhdfcbank
acceptanceCriteria: The file frontend/public/assets/generated/upi-qr.png exists and contains the uploaded UPI QR code image showing 'NIDHI AESTICARE' and UPI ID: nidhi.aesticare@okhdfcbank.
The PaywallModal renders this image as the QR code using the path /assets/generated/upi-qr.png.
The QR code image is clearly visible and not cropped or distorted in the modal.

file_operations.description: Save the uploaded UPI QR code image (WhatsApp Image 2026-02-26 at 02.01.00.jpeg) as frontend/public/assets/generated/upi-qr.png. This image shows NIDHI AESTICARE with UPI ID nidhi.aesticare@okhdfcbank and a Google Pay logo in the center. Replace any existing file at this path. The edited image file is frontend/public/assets/generated/upi-qr.dim_600x700.png and should be used as the source for this static asset.

Update the PaywallModal component to reference the new UPI QR code image at /assets/generated/upi-qr.png. Replace any existing QR code image reference or placeholder with this path. Ensure the image is rendered with appropriate sizing (width/height or responsive classes) so it is clearly visible and not distorted. Do not change the UPI ID string 'nidhi.aesticare@okhdfcbank', the modal dismissal behavior, the WhatsApp link, or any other functional aspects of the modal.
